synopsis.text: Unlimited Blade Works fans are in for a treat as the second Blu-ray box set of the Fate/stay night anime unveils a special surprise. The set features a 10-minute short anime that delves into an alternate 'good' ending of the original game's 'Unlimited Blade Works' route. Titled 'sunny day,' this short promises to bring a fresh perspective to the beloved storyline, offering fans a unique and heartwarming conclusion to cherish. Don't miss out on this exciting addition to the Fate/stay night universe!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
